mapper.insert: insert into tb_exercise_info (excer_id, bank_id, order_no, content, selection_a, selection_b, selection_c, selection_d, selection_correct, answer, own_domain, own_process, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{excerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectionA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectionB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectionC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectionD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectionCorrect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_exercise_info set bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, selection_a = #{selectionA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, selection_b = #{selectionB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, selection_c = #{selectionC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, selection_d = #{selectionD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, selection_correct = #{selectionCorrect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, own_domain = #{ownDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, own_process = #{ownProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where excer_id = #{excerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select excer_id, bank_id, order_no, content, selection_a, selection_b, selection_c, selection_d, selection_correct, answer, own_domain, own_process, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from tb_exercise_info where excer_id = #{excerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select excer_id, bank_id, order_no, content, selection_a, selection_b, selection_c, selection_d, selection_correct, answer, own_domain, own_process, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from tb_exercise_info

select excer_id, bank_id, order_no, content, selection_a, selection_b, selection_c, selection_d, selection_correct, answer, own_domain, own_process, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from tb_exercise_info where order_no=#{orderNo} and bank_id=#{bankId}
